command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.Fusion.properties.scenarioExclusionPatterns" options="scenario-exclusion-patterns" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.Fusion.properties.sourceSettings" options="source-settings" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.Fusion.properties.sourceSettings[].sourceSubTypes" options="source-sub-types">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.Fusion.properties.sourceSettings[].sourceSubTypes[].severityFilters.filters" options="filters">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.MicrosoftSecurityIncidentCreation.properties.displayNamesExcludeFilter" options="display-names-exclude-filter" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.MicrosoftSecurityIncidentCreation.properties.displayNamesFilter" options="display-names-filter" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.MicrosoftSecurityIncidentCreation.properties.severitiesFilter" options="severities-filter" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.NRT.properties.tactics" options="tactics" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.NRT.properties.techniques" options="techniques" group="Properties">
<help short="The version of the alert rule template used to create this rule - in format , where all are numbers, for example 0 <1.0.2>"/>
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.Scheduled.properties.entityMappings" options="entity-mappings" group="Properties" cls="EntityMappings_create">
<arg type="array" var="@EntityMappings_create[].fieldMappings" options="field-mappings">
<arg type="array" var="@IncidentConfiguration_create.groupingConfiguration.groupByAlertDetails" options="group-by-alert-details">
<arg type="array" var="@IncidentConfiguration_create.groupingConfiguration.groupByCustomDetails" options="group-by-custom-details">
<arg type="array" var="@IncidentConfiguration_create.groupingConfiguration.groupByEntities" options="group-by-entities">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.Scheduled.properties.tactics" options="tactics" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$alertRule.Scheduled.properties.techniques" options="techniques" group="Properties">
<help short="The version of the alert rule template used to create this rule - in format , where all are numbers, for example 0 <1.0.2>"/>

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$alertRule.Fusion.properties.scenarioExclusionPatterns" options="scenario-exclusion-patterns" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$alertRule.Fusion.properties.sourceSettings" options="source-settings" group="Properties">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$alertRule.MicrosoftSecurityIncidentCreation.properties.severitiesFilter" options="severities-filter" group="Properties">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$alertRule.NRT.properties.techniques" options="techniques" group="Properties">
